column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////For brunch
column4: and the andouille dish (forgot the name!). I didn't care too much for the savory dish...it was very meaty and heavy. But man oh man that almond croissant was insanely good and complimented with a sip of that cappuccino...perfection! I recently had a study session at a nearby coffee shop and couldn't help myself from stopping at Common Bond. I got the $3 chocolate chip cookie. It was super dense
column6: filled with chocolate chunks and walnuts(?). Sooo good... Although mostly everything here is pricey
column7: there is no substitution for the pastries they offer!
